file_posix::write

Write to the open file.

Synopsis 
std::size_t
write(
    void const* buffer,
    std::size_t n,
    error_code& ec);
Description
Parameters

Name

Description

buffer

The buffer holding the data to write

n

The number of bytes to write

ec

Set to the error, if any occurred
